title: Community-Based Farm Safety Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental farm work environments and foundational educational competencies
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented curriculum design leveraging local community resources, with smartphone-based digital content access

learning_goals: Participants can establish a community collaboration system for designing farm safety education modules.
Participants can operate farm safety practical training using smartphone-based tools.
Participants can apply at least three safety education methods suitable for the target learners (children).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
